Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
14.01.2014 GB SCR18644 Added CountryCode = DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended INVO_INVOICENO to alpha 20 for sort on INVO
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 Added BDC151 PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
25.02.2008 SH SCR13415 Extended argument list of BDC151 acc. to new parameters
16.07.2007 SH SCR12708 Added new selection = 3 for "Invoices"
12.07.2007 AK SCR12693 test on DATLASTSCHEDULE instead of DATLASTINVOICE
26.03.2007 AK SCR12383 PaymentdaysDuedate can be negative
18.07.2006 SH SCR11586 Extended update of v.CreditLimitGroup with
v.CreditLimitDebtor if v.CreditLimitDebtor > 0 and v.CreditLimitDebtor >
30.05.2006 SH SCR11369 Changed update of v.CreditLimitGroup
24.05.2006 SH SCR11339 Removed test on DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 and skipped writing
of rows if PI.SELECTIONTYPE = 2 and v.CreditLimitGroup = -1
-- PI.SECLECTIONTYPE = 1 or 2
-- PI.SECLECTIONTYPE = 3
... prepare dynamically WhereClause to select debtors
... has to be perforemd below v.BDC151.PO.DEBCNOCLIMIT because of re-computing
after BDC151 call
-- Reset variables
... calculate payment days
... prepare fields for output
... prepare output line
(skip the rows where CreditLimitGroup = -1 and PI.SELECTIONTYPE = 2)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTINVDATE) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDUEDATE) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNT-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDISPUTES-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTPARTIALPAYM) as decimal(15,2)) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO = :2 and DCMO_YEAR = :3 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only

Text.val: ... has to be perforemd below v.BDC151.PO.DEBCNOCLIMIT because of re-computing
after BDC151 call
-- Reset variables
-- Calculate credit limit on debtor client group level
... prepare output line
